items.title: Openbox.ai
items.description: Learning hard & soft skills. I have worked with technologies such as JavaScript, CSS, HTML, PHP, React.js, Next.js, MySQL, and Rest API. I have been involved in the development of websites and landing pages. I have participated in the creation of email marketing campaigns. I have worked on system bug fixes. I have been involved in deploying applications to production. I have also developed dashboard applications for internal reporting purposes.

items.title: Openbox.ai
items.description: Responsible for maintaining the institutional website. Responsible for reducing time and effort in the marketing area through marketing automation via RD Station. Creating reports in internal dashboard applications. Involved in deploying applications to production. Worked with technologies such as TypeScript, JavaScript, React, CSS, Styled-components, Next.js, Node.js, PHP, HTML, Gulp, Axios, REST, RESTFul. Creating UI/UX flows using the Figma tool.

items.title: Ubistart
items.description: Worked with the Git Flow workflow model, which aims to simplify and organize the branching versioning of a development project in Git. Participated in agile ceremonies such as SCRUM and Kanban. Managed tasks using BitBucket and Jira. Conducted presentations of new features developed in the Sprint by the Front-End team. Responsible for creating automated tests (unit/integration). Developed features following the principles of Clean Code and SOLID. Worked with technologies such as React, Next, Electron, JavaScript, TypeScript, Styled-components, CSS, Sass, PHP, Node.js, Docker, Axios, Redux, Zustend, REST, RESTFul. Contributed to the development and maintenance of features. Responsible for creating and maintaining documentation of the developed software to preserve knowledge and assist future individuals interacting with each topic. Provided contributions to technical specifications and implementations to ensure quality and scalability in team deliveries.

items.title: CWI
items.description: Worked with the Git Flow workflow model. Participated in agile ceremonies such as SCRUM and Kanban. Managed tasks using BitBucket. Developed features following best practices and adhering to the team's established standards. Contributed to the development and maintenance of features. Provided input on technical specifications and implementations to ensure high-quality and scalable deliveries. Created customizable components. Worked with technologies such as React, Next, Electron, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, Styled-components, CSS, Sass, Node.js, Docker, Axios, Redux, Context API, REST, RESTful. Conducted code reviews to ensure quality and standardization in deliveries. Participated in agile ceremonies such as SCRUM and Kanban.
